answers.answer: Hi,It's time to find a new doctor, that is willing to care and work with you.  I fired several until, my most recent doc, that has helped me tremendously.Hope you feel better soon.  Good luck to you !

question: I resently had a Thyroid ultrasound.  I have a multinodule goiter, hyperthyroid & graves. I wan't to know what hypoechoic nodule a little over 1 cm.............Should I have any concern?  My TSH is 17 and My Thyroid Stimulating Immunoglob is 386.  I'm not losing any weight and have Diabetes.  My Dr. isn't all that interested..............
title: Ultrasound Results
